name: Insanely Wavy Rescue Transmitter
description:
This game was created during the Global Game Jam 2018, in 48h (even less), entirely in Python 3 using the HARFANG® 3D framework.

For educational purpose, you can download source code on [Github].

  • Code: Erk
  • Gfx 2D: Florian BELMONTE
  • Gfx 3D: Simon GIBIER
  • Music/SFX: DJ Seb
